intro: We are here to assist you... Thank you for using Crypta. We will provide you with the current Bitcoin price at intervals of %%notch%%.
intro_once: We are here to assist you... Thank you for using Crypta. We will provide you with the current Bitcoin price.
btcprice_once: The current Bitcoin price is %%price%% USD. The recent change rate is approximately %%percent_change_1h%%% in the past hour, about %%percent_change_24h%%% in the last day, and around %%percent_change_7d%%% over the past seven days.
btcprice: The current Bitcoin price is %%price%% USD. The recent change rate is approximately %%percent_change_1h%%% in the past hour, about %%percent_change_24h%%% in the last day, and around %%percent_change_7d%%% over the past seven days. We will notify you again in %%interval%%.
btcpriceticker: ⭐️ The current Bitcoin price is %%price%% USD. The recent change rate is approximately %%percent_change_1h%%% in the last hour, about %%percent_change_24h%%% in the last day, and around %%percent_change_7d%%% over the past seven days.
loading: Data is being retrieved. Please wait for a moment.
